AllJoyn Java API

Uses of Package
org.alljoyn.bus

Packages that use org.alljoyn.bus
org.alljoyn.bus This package holds all of the AllJoyn code for creating and using interfaces. 
org.alljoyn.bus.ifaces This package contains various standard AllJoyn interfaces. 
 

Classes in org.alljoyn.bus used by org.alljoyn.bus
AuthListener
          Authentication listeners are responsible for handling AllJoyn authentication requests.
AuthListener.AuthRequest
          Authentication request.
BusAttachment.RemoteMessage
          Policy for handling messages received from remote devices.
BusException
          Base class of AllJoyn exceptions.
BusListener
          Bus listeners are responsible for handling callbacks from the AllJoyn system.
BusObject
          Implemented by classes that are AllJoyn bus objects.
KeyStoreListener
          Implemented by a user-defined class that is responsible for loading and storing keys.
MessageContext
          Contains information about a specific method call or signal message.
Mutable.IntegerValue
          A class providing inout parameter semantics for Java ints.
Mutable.ShortValue
          A class providing inout parameter semantics for Java shorts.
Mutable.StringValue
          A class providing [in,out] parameter semantics for Java Strings.
OnJoinSessionListener
          An OnJoinSessionListener is responsible for receiving completion indcations from asynchronous join operations.
ProxyBusObject
          A bus object that exists and is managed by some other connection to the bus.
SecurityViolationListener
          Allows an application to monitor security violations.
SessionListener
          A SessionListener is responsible for handling session related callbacks from the AllJoyn system.
SessionOpts
           
SessionPortListener
          A SessionPortListener is responsible for handling session port related callbacks from the AllJoyn system.
SignalEmitter.GlobalBroadcast
          Controls behavior of broadcast signals (null desintation).
Status
          Standard function return codes for this package.
VariantTypeReference
          Used when calling Variant.getObject(Class) where the wrapped object is a generic type such as Map<K, V>.
 

Classes in org.alljoyn.bus used by org.alljoyn.bus.ifaces
BusException
          Base class of AllJoyn exceptions.
Variant
          A DBus/AllJoyn datatype whose type information is encoded into the value field.
